scenario_text.value:
Um, are we really going to go through this
tunnel?

I don’t see any other way. This is our only
option, right?
You’re not afraid of the dark, are you, Aoi?

J-just a bit.
Creeps me out just a little bit...

Hey, why are we talking about this?! We have
to bring Saki and the others back right away!
